c74object.name: afterglow.max.Var
c74object.digest: Set and monitor an Afterglow show variable
c74object.description:
Allows the value of a show variable to be set via int or float messages to the inlet. Any changes to the variable, whether they came from Max or elsewhere, will cause the new value to be sent as an int or float message from the outlet. The value can also be queried by sending a bang message to the inlet, which will send the current variable value to the outlet. If the variable has no current value, a bang will be sent instead.
The variable to control and monitor is determined by the single argument to the object.

outlet.digest: Current value: int, float; Empty: bang

objarg.name: variable
objarg.digest: The name of the variable within the show.

method.name: int
method.description: Sets the value of the show variable to the argument.

method.name: float
method.description: Sets the value of the show variable to the argument.

method.name: bang
method.description: Sends the current value of the variable from the outlet as an int or float message. If the variable has no current value, sends a bang instead.
